name: web3-ebakus
description: Web3 module to add transaction PoW for Ebakus.

scripts.build:webassembly: rm -f src/cryptonight.js src/cryptonight.wasm && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src trzeci/emscripten emcc -Os  -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s  NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['cwrap']" --llvm-lto 1 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=67108864 -s WASM=1 -s BINARYEN=1 -s BINARYEN_TRAP_MODE="js" -s BINARYEN_METHOD="native-wasm" -s BINARYEN_ASYNC_COMPILATION=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_cryptonight']" --post-js ./hash_cn/webassembly/module-post.js ./hash_cn/webassembly/blake.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/cryptonight.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/groestl.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/jh_ansi_opt64.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/keccak.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/main.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/oaes_lib.o  ./hash_cn/webassembly/skein.o -Wall -lm -o ./src/cryptonight.js
